name: Win Condition
_source: speak;Simon;Thanks for lending us a hand back there.
speak;Titus;The name's Titus, by the way. I'm a member of the Wandering Knights.
speak;Titus;We've set out to stop the miasma plaguing these lands.
speak;Simon;Coincidentally, we're here for a similar reason.
speak;Simon;Think your troops would be willing to lend us a hand?
speak;Titus;Seems the Fates have it in for us. Our convoy has been ravaged by bandits and many of our soldiers have disappeared in the night.
speak;Titus;Only a few paladins and I remain.
speak;Titus;This place is cursed, it seems.
speak;Titus;Between the miasma and the monsters, we've had some foul luck.
speak;Titus;Anyways, Vesner's tomb is just a ways ahead.
speak;Titus;With luck, we can find some way to end the miasma spilling out from his corpse.
